CVE.summary: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Koan Software Mega Mall allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) t, (2) productId, (3) sk, (4) x, or (5) so parameter to (a) product_review.php; or the (6) orderNo parameter to (b) order-track.php.
